description.zh: Flowise 是一个开源的低代码平台，旨在帮助用户通过可视化方式构建和部署 AI 代理。它允许开发者和非开发者使用拖放界面创建自定义 AI 工作流。该平台支持本地部署和云端部署，为不同环境提供灵活性和可扩展性。
description.en: Flowise is an open-source, low-code platform designed to help users visually build and deploy AI agents. It allows developers and non-developers to create custom AI workflows using a drag-and-drop interface. The platform supports self-hosting and cloud deployment, offering flexibility and scalability for different environments.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 支持技术人员与非技术人员通过可视化界面开发 AI 代理
- 提供本地部署与云端部署等多种灵活部署方式
- 支持第三方工具集成，扩展性强

## 功能列表:

- 拖拽式 AI 工作流构建界面
- 支持使用 Docker Compose 和自定义镜像进行部署
- 通过 `.env` 文件支持多环境配置
- 提供详细的开发文档和 API 参考
- 采用模块化单体仓库结构，分离后端、前端与组件
- 提供 AWS、Azure、GCP、Digital Ocean 等主流云平台部署指南
- 支持在 HuggingFace Spaces、Railway、Render 等平台部署
- 通过 Discord 和 GitHub Discussions 提供活跃社区与技术支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Enables visual, low-code development of AI agents for both technical and non-technical users
- Offers flexible deployment options including self-hosting and cloud services
- Integrates with third-party tools and platforms for extended functionality

## Features:

- Drag-and-drop interface for building AI workflows
- Support for Docker deployment with Docker Compose and custom images
- Multi-environment configuration via `.env` files
- Comprehensive developer documentation and API references
- Modular monorepo structure with backend, frontend, and component separation
- Deployment guides for AWS, Azure, GCP, Digital Ocean, and other cloud providers
- Available on HuggingFace Spaces, Railway, Render, and other platforms
- Active community and support via Discord and GitHub Discussions
